19 template <class Gui>
20 class TRestorableGuiWrap: public Gui
21 {
22 public:
23  typedef Gui BaseClass;
24 
25  I_BEGIN_BASE_COMPONENT(TRestorableGuiWrap);
26  I_ASSIGN(m_settingsProviderCompPtr, "SettingsProvider", "Application settings provider", false, "SettingsProvider");
27  I_END_COMPONENT;
28 
29 protected:
30  // abstract methods
31  virtual void OnRestoreSettings(const QSettings& settings) = 0;
32  virtual void OnSaveSettings(QSettings& settings) const = 0;
33 
34  // pseudo-reimplemented (iqtgui::CGuiComponentBase)
35  virtual bool CreateGui(QWidget* parentPtr);
36  virtual bool DestroyGui();
37 
38 private:
39  I_REF(iqt::ISettingsProvider, m_settingsProviderCompPtr);

45 template <class Gui>
46 bool TRestorableGuiWrap<Gui>::CreateGui(QWidget* parentPtr)
47 {
48  bool retVal = BaseClass::CreateGui(parentPtr);
49 
50  if (m_settingsProviderCompPtr.IsValid()){
51  OnRestoreSettings(m_settingsProviderCompPtr->GetSettings());
52  }
53 
54  return retVal;
55 }
56 
57 
58 template <class Gui>
59 bool TRestorableGuiWrap<Gui>::DestroyGui()
60 {
61  if (m_settingsProviderCompPtr.IsValid()){
62  OnSaveSettings(m_settingsProviderCompPtr->GetSettings());
63  }
64 
65  return BaseClass::DestroyGui();
66 }

iqtgui::TRestorableGuiWrap
